1.0.0.name: wordpress/twibadge
1.0.0.description:
This is a WordPress plugin to show your Twitter badge as a widget with easy personalization. This plugin is brought to you by Blog Highlight.

Features:

  1. Integrate Twitter and WordPress
  2. Show Twitter badge as a WordPress widget
  3. Support flash interactive widget
  4. Easy personalization, no coding knowledge is needed
  5. Support shortcode [twibadge]
  6. Support non-widget theme

Plugin Homepage: http://www.bloghighlight.com/wordpress-plugins/twibadge/
